name: Mario teams up with Boo the ghost (Max Mario)
name_original: Mario teams up with Boo the ghost (Max Mario)
description:
Mario teams up with Boo the ghost

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Please take a look at this video to know how to play and the idea of this game.

This time Boo is not the enemy, he will team up with Mario!

You need to control Boo the ghost to help Mario clear the level.

Boo has a special skill that can possess any other character, he can possess Koopa and Mario.

The goal is to collect all keys to exit each level.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

How to play:

Arrows to move,

Up arrow to jump,

Space to possess any other character.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Deconstruction of game:

I am always interested in sharing and discussing the technical details with the community by providing a deconstruction view of the whole project.

Leave comments below if you want to know the implementation details of any game mechanics and features.

If you want to know how to make this game, stay tuned for my dev logs releasing soon.
